items.sentence: I don\'t think Mary would leave her husband.
I don\'t think Tom is capable of doing that.

I don\'t think Tom is old enough to do that.
I don\'t think it\'ll be all that difficult.
Tom lets Mary get away with almost anything.
Tom told Mary he was planning on doing that.
Tom told Mary he was planning to rob a bank.
We\'ve been very busy for the last few days.
I really thought that Tom wouldn\'t do that.
Tom hoped somebody would come to his rescue.
Tom hoped that Mary would come to his party.
Tom intends to go regardless of the weather.
Tom is your sister\'s ex-husband, isn\'t he?
Everybody knows that Tom doesn\'t like Mary.
Everyone here knows that we don\'t eat pork.
It seemed improbable that Tom would succeed.
It seems to me Tom is a part of the problem.
I thought I told you not to do that in here.
I thought it was totally normal at the time.
How many people are you planning on calling?
I\'m sorry that Tom wasn\'t able to be here.
We haven\'t yet finished what we have to do.
We\'re going to have to do better than this.
We\'re going to have to make some new rules.
We\'re just busy enough to stay in business.

It\'s going to be a good experience for Tom.
